This picture is of the dragon called Nafegen.  The shot itself was sent to me by my daughter, Shanti, on the Cazic-Thule server.  Here her and a bunch of others went after to slay the beast.  Unfortunately, the zone crashed just after the dragon was defeated, causing havoc for some that were bound there.  Regardless, this is one of the best pictures of Nafegen I've seen.

Click on the picture to see a larger image.

 

If you have a screen shot from EverQuest you believe to show how awe-inspiring the game is, please let me know.  However, please do NOT send BMP (bitmap) formats of any pictures.  If a bitmap is received, it will be deleted.   I prefer not to spend hours downloading my e-mail and instead focus time on either this site or playing the game itself.
